name: TOOT TOOT (quackqack)
description:
TOOT TILL YOU DROOP

  • The SWISS MISS gave you a KISS.
  • And PROMISED all THIS if you would INSIST.
  • You must TOOT TOOT to boop the SNOOT.

TOOT your trumpet to the song. Control the valves with QWE and your pitch with SHIFT - then press space to TOOT.

EVERY 10 SECONDS the TOOTERs will multiply, increasing your multiplier. Don’t let it drop!

Think you’re a Trumpet Hero? Post your high score in the comments below.

Think you’re a Trumpet GOD? Press M on the start screen =).

HOW TO PLAY

  • Hold QWE combinations to TOOT different notes.
  • Press and hold SPACE to TOOT the trumpet and hit purple circle notes.
  • Hold SHIFT while TOOTing to hit gold diamond notes.
